attributes.action: give a state honour to the Lexicographer and Author Susie Dent for services to the English Language.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Susie Dent is the resident lexicographer on the channel four programme countdown. With commendable charm and diplomacy adjudicates on the correctness of the words offered by contestants.

She also is the author of a number of books on the English language.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
